titleStmt.title: A declaration and vindication of Iohn Pym Esquire: concerning the divers aspersions which have been cast upon him by sundry base and scandalous pamphlets, and by divers malignants, and people ill-affected to the good of the Common-wealth. Shewing his continuall fidelitie and integritie towards His Majestie, and the High Court of Parliament, for the good of this Kingdome, and other His Majesties dominions.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: The "3" in the imprint date crossed out; "1642".
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
